content: **knitted heart/christmas decoration in drops fiesta work piece in the round in stocking stitch bottom up theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #dropswinterpinehearts drops design pattern fs-018 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size ** piece measures approx width = 10 cm height = 10 cm **yarn** drops fiesta from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 16 herb garden / 20 northern lights / 07 sea green / 13 dark ivy **accessories** some cotton wool for filling string or left-over yarn for strap 1 heart weighs approx 10 grams with filling **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm **knitting gauge ** 22 stitches in width and 30 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 3 5 = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
